DOC.brief_summary: This study randomly assign emergency department patient seek treatment headache one three group . The first group receive standard emergency care determine treat physician , second group breathe high flow air facemask 15 minute , third group breathe high flow oxygen face mask 15 minute . The patient question begin treatment 2 , 5 , 10 , 15 30 minute 's begin intensity headache much relief experience treatment . Concentration carbon dioxide exhale patient also record 0 , 2 , 5 , 10 , 15 30 minute . After fifteen minute , patient group 2 3 continue standard emergency care , include treatment physician see fit . Patients three group receive stopwatch begin emergency department visit record total extent time headache take resolve .
DOC.brief_title: Oxygen Therapy Treatment Undifferentiated Headache Emergency Department
